section.title: Connection of Ethernet Ports
section.p: Connect one end of a network cable to the LAN port of the gateway, and the other end to any port of companyâ€™s LAN switch/router.

section.title: RJ11 Phone Port
section.p: Connect one end of a RJ11 phone cable to the port. Connect the other end to your analog telephone.

section.title: RJ21 Connection
section.p: Connect one end of a RJ21 cable to the connector. Connect the other ends to your analog telephones.

ul.li: Power off the TA device before plugging or unplugging the cables.
Disconnect all telecommunication network connectors and cable distribution system connectors before power off the TA device.

ol.li: Disconnect all telecommunication network connectors and cable distribution system connectors before power off the TA device.
Plug the power adapter into an electrical outlet.
Press the On switch to power on the gateway.

note.p: The gateway will start booting. In the meantime, you will see that the POWER and RUN indicator lights turn on.
